name: Nurse Me!
description:
Having collapsed at your job you soon find yourself at hospital... Though sure it was just a matter of stress from overwork a variety of sexy women seem intent on making sure you are at the peek of health before you leave... And they have some interesting ways of testing you...

A visual novel story where your choices will determine your fate and what fun or horror you get to enjoy along the way.

Game Features

  • A light visual novel style storyline
  • Multiple choices to make that affect the story
  • Multiple good and bad ending to unlock
  • Sexy adult Illustrations to enjoy
  • Exquisitely illustrated H-scenes
